item.title: US imposes sanctions on El Chapo's fugitive sons
item.description: The U.S. imposed sanctions on the two fugitive sons of incarcerated Mexican Sinaloa Cartel leader Joaquin “El Chapo” Guzman and announced a reward off...

item.title: Prosecutors seek retrial for death row inmate Richard Glossip
item.description: Oklahoma prosecutors say they will retry longtime death row inmate Richard Glossip a third time for his role in the 1997 killing of his former boss

item.title: States sue US government over deal ending ban on triggers that make some rifles fire more rapidly
item.description: Sixteen states have sued the Trump administration over its plan to allow the sale of forced-reset triggers and return seized devices

item.title: White House budget request slashes funding for tribal colleges and universities
item.description: If President Donald Trump's budget proposal wins final congressional approval, funding will be slashed for tribal colleges and universities

item.title: Small plane carrying six people crashes off the San Diego coast
item.description: Authorities are investigating after a small plane carrying six people crashed off the San Diego coast
